00055       { return m_distPoint.getMapID(); }
00056

00068    uint32 save( Packet* p, int& pos ) const;

00088 private:
00089    ostream& dump( ostream& o ) const {
00090       o << "DisturbanceDescription: " << m_distPoint << " : "
00091         << m_splitPoint << " -> " <<  m_joinPoint << ", typ = "
00092         << uint32( m_type ) << " distid = " << m_distID
00093         << " comment = " << MC2CITE( m_comment ) << endl;
00094       return o;
00095    }
00096    
00097    friend ostream& operator<<( ostream& o,
00098                                const DisturbanceDescription& dist ) {
00099       return dist.dump(o);
00100    }

00102
